snippet: Christiana Fisher, the former director of social service agencies that Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez controlled, admitted she had allowed inaccurate documents about a salary increase to be delivered to a grand jury.
abstract: Christiana Fisher, former director of the Ridgewood Bushwick Senior Citizens Council, part of network of social service agencies controlled by Assemblyman Vito J Lopez, pleads guilty to a federal criminal contempt charge.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: Christiana Fisher, the former director of social service agencies that Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez controlled, admitted she had allowed inaccurate documents about a salary increase to be delivered to a grand jury.

headline.seo: Christiana Fisher Pleads Guilty After Salary Documents Questioned
headline.main: Ex-Director of Agencies Controlled by Lopez Pleads Guilty to Contempt
headline.print_headline: Ex-Director of Agencies Controlled by Lopez Pleads Guilty to Contempt
